hints.content:
First, let's fill in $\purpleD{1}\blueE{3}\maroonD5$ on the place value chart.

Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\purpleD{1}$ | $\blueE3$ | $\maroonD5$

$\begin{align}
\purpleD{1}\text{ hundred} &=\purpleD{100} \\\\
\blueE{3}\text{ tens}&=\blueE{30} \\\\
 \maroonD5\text{ ones}&=\maroonD5
\end{align}$

$135=\purpleD{100} + \blueE{30} + \maroonD{5}$

Now, let's say the number $\purpleD1\blueE3\maroonD5$ out loud and write it in written form.

$\purpleD{\text{one hundred}}\blueE{\text{ thirty-}}\maroonD{\text{five}}$

Here is the completed chart:

Number Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
$135$ | One hundred thirty-five | ${100}+{30} + 5$

question.content:
